ui.trough_hint: Add creatures to calculate trough duration

tooltips.creature: Select the creature species to calculate for
tooltips.birth_time: Time required for incubation or gestation
tooltips.time_to_juvenile: Time remaining until the baby reaches 10% maturation (Juvenile)
tooltips.time_to_adult: Time remaining until the creature is fully grown
tooltips.hand_feed: Feed manually until this maturation percentage - then a full inventory lasts until Juvenile
tooltips.current_buffer: How long the baby can survive with its current inventory capacity
tooltips.food_capacity: Total amount of {{food}} that fits in the inventory based on current weight capacity
tooltips.food_rate: Total food points consumed per minute (scaled by maturation)
tooltips.gen2_hatch: Enable if using Maewing or being in Genesis 2 area for hatch bonus
tooltips.gen2_growth: Enable if being in Genesis 2 area for maturation speed bonus
tooltips.hatch_speed: Server multiplier for egg hatching and bridge incubation
tooltips.maturation_speed: Server multiplier for creature growth speed
tooltips.consumption_speed: Server multiplier for how fast babies consume food
tooltips.selected_food: The primary food source for calculations
tooltips.trough_duration: How long the food in the trough will last before running out
tooltips.food_eaten: Total number of food items consumed by all creatures in the simulation
tooltips.food_spoiled: Total number of food items lost to spoilage during the simulation
tooltips.efficiency: Percentage of food eaten vs total food (including spoilage)
tooltips.trough_type: The insulation/multiplier of the trough (Normal: 1x, Tek: 100x etc.)
tooltips.creatures_in_trough: List of creatures sharing the food in this trough
tooltips.add_current_creature: Add the currently selected creature to the trough list
tooltips.remove_creature: Remove this creature from the list
tooltips.quantity: Number of creatures of this type
tooltips.food_stack: Number of full food stacks in the trough
tooltips.game_version: Toggle between ASA (Ark Survival Ascended) and ASE (Ark Survival Evolved) logic
